DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study inform integration mobile social medium component large intervention aim increase adherence maintenance physical activity . Nearly half US population meet physical activity recommendation â‰¥150 minute moderate activity per week . The use smartphones `` self track '' data upload data online social network become increasingly common may effective way motivate physical activity adherence maintenance . We propose two phase study develop evaluate mobile health ( `` mHealth '' ) intervention include use two exist technology : 1 ) RunKeeper mobile app collect upload exercise data ( distance , pace , time ) , 2 ) RunKeeper.com online social network place analyze upload data engage coach online community . Phase 1 ( n=10 ) iteratively develop mHealth intervention phase 2 ( n=30 ) pilot mHealth intervention ( participant randomize either mHealth intervention ( n=20 ) control ( n=10 ) ) collect feasibility , acceptability preliminary efficacy data . All participant attend day-long ChiWalk/Run training help avoid potential injury meet coach community in-person . All participant also ask wear FitBit accelerometer one week begin intervention one week end intervention collect total physical activity data . This data upload automatically study data base . Primary outcomes total physical activity collect FitBit accelerometer ( RunKeeper mobile app intervention group ) secondary outcome change psychological factor may mediate adherence physical activity .
DOC.brief_title: EXercise Continuation Incorporating Technology Enhancements ( EXCITE ) Study
DOC.criteria: healthy underactive adult interested use mobile web base technology increase physical activity low risk cardiovascular disease comfortable read communicate English own smartphone regularly use fitness track mobile app regular access internet wireless connection data uploading . currently meeting/exceeding recommend 450 MET min per week previous condition would contraindicate regular moderate vigorous physical activity
